name: BlueJ Portable (PortableApps.com)
short_description:
This is the first attempt that I know of to put BlueJ, the easy to use and learn Java programming interface, into the PortableApps.com platform. Every single version will be available as they are made.

All versions prior to 3.0.8 Dev Test 5 have the OpenJDK bundled. All versions from 3.0.8 Dev Test 6 onward rely upon gluxon's OpenJDK Portable build (http://portableapps.com/node/35441). Separate builds will no longer be created.

2012-11-30 Update:
People never cease to amaze me. At the time of this writing the project has 8729 downloads and for the second month in a row, hit a new download high of 798. Thanks again for your continuing support! Hopefully this translates to an official release someday.
